#	Example:
# 
#	example_effect = {
#		treasury = 100
#		add_adm_power = 50
#	}
#
#
#	In a script file:
#
#	effect = {
#		example_effect = yes
#	}
#
add_national_stability_or_adm_power = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			stability = 3
		}
		add_adm_power = 50
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { stability = 3 }
		}
		random_list = {
			40 = { change_variable = { which = national_stability value = 500 } }
			35 = { change_variable = { which = national_stability value = 300 } }
			15 = { change_variable = { which = national_stability value = 250 } }
			10 = { change_variable = { which = national_stability value = 150 } }
		}
	}
}

determine_preemption = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_heir = "Cadet Branch" }}
				store_current_heir = yes
			}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
			set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
			set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				has_country_flag = vef_absolute_primo
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_heir = "Cadet Branch" }}
				store_current_heir = yes
			}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = female_gen1_1_age }
			define_female_heir = yes
			set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_female_heir = yes
			has_country_flag = vef_malepref_primo
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}}
			store_current_heir = yes
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
			set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
			set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
		}
	}
}

salic_law_heir_death = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m2_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m2_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m3_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m3_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m3_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m3_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m4_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m4_stored }

		}

	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m4_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m4_heir
	}
	else_if = {

		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m4_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_2m4_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_2m4_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_2m4_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_2m4_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m4_sons value = 1 }}

		define_male_heir = yes

		random_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = cadet_branch_@ROOT
			#	NOT = { any_country = { NOT = { tag = PREV } check_variable = { which = cadet_branch_time which = PREV }}}
			}
			ROOT = { define_heir = { name = "Cadet Branch" dynasty = PREV male = yes age = 15 max_random_adm = 0 max_random_dip = 0 max_random_mil = 0 no_consort_with_heir = yes female = yes }}
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 0 }
	}
}


agnatic_primogeniture_heir_death = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }

		}

			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_2f3_heir
	}

		}

	}
}

male_primogeniture_heir_death = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_heir = no }
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}}

		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir

		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir

		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_1f2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1f2_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes

	}
}

absolute_primogeniture_heir_death = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m2_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m2_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m3_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m3_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen2_1m3_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m3_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 3 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m4_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m4_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen2_1m4_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m4_stored }}

			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen0_4_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 0 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen0_4_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m1_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m1_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_4m1_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m1_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_4m1_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_4m1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m1_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m2_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m2_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_4m2_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m2_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_4m2_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_4m2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m2_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m3_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m3_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_4m3_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m3_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_4m3_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_4m3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m3_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m4_age value = 1080 }}}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m4_stored }
			set_heir = male_gen1_4m4_@ROOT
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m4_stored }}
			set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_4m4_age }
			define_male_heir = yes
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_4m4_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m4_sons value = 1 }}
		set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 12 }
		define_male_heir = yes
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { any_country = { has_country_flag = cadet_branch_@ROOT }}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = cadet_branch_@ROOT
			#	NOT = { any_country = { NOT = { tag = PREV } check_variable = { which = cadet_branch_time which = PREV }}}
			}
			ROOT = { define_heir = { name = "Cadet Branch" dynasty = PREV male = yes age = 15 max_random_adm = 0 max_random_dip = 0 max_random_mil = 0 no_consort_with_heir = yes female = yes }}
		}
		set_variable = { which = vef_heir_gen value = 0 }
	}
}

agnatic_seniority_heir_death = {
}

lateral_shift_heirs = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = lateral_shift_2 }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_age which = female_gen1_1 age }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f3_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f3_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_age which = female_gen1_2 age }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f1_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_sons value = 1 }
		}

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_age which = female_gen1_3 age }

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_sons value = 1 }
		}

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_sons value = 1 }

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_sons value = 1 }
		}

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_sons value = 1 }

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_daughters value = 1 }

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_daughters value = 1 }

			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_3f4_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_age which = female_gen1_4 age }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f1_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f2_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f3_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f4_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f1_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f2_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f3_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f4_age value = 1080 }}}
			change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		#NEW HEIRS
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age which = male_gen1_2m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons which = male_gen1_2m1_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters which = male_gen1_2m1_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age which = male_gen1_2m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_sons which = male_gen1_2m2_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_daughters which = male_gen1_2m2_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age which = male_gen1_2m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_sons which = male_gen1_2m3_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_daughters which = male_gen1_2m3_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age which = male_gen1_2m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_sons which = male_gen1_2m4_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_daughters which = male_gen1_2m4_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age which = female_gen1_2m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_sons which = female_gen1_2m1_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_daughters which = female_gen1_2m1_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age which = female_gen1_2m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_sons which = female_gen1_2m2_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_daughters which = female_gen1_2m2_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age which = female_gen1_2m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_sons which = female_gen1_2m3_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_daughters which = female_gen1_2m3_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age which = female_gen1_2m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_sons which = female_gen1_2m4_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_daughters which = female_gen1_2m4_daughters }
		generate_new_grandchildren = yes
		clr_country_flag = lateral_shift_2
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = lateral_shift_3 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }}
				check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }}
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_age which = female_gen1_1 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
			}

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_age which = female_gen1_2 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_daughters value = 1 }

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_age which = female_gen1_4 age }

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
					check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
					check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
					check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
					check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
				}
				check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_age value = 1080 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_daughters value = 1 }}
				check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_age value = 1080 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_daughters value = 1 }}
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_age which = female_gen1_1 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }
			}

				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
					check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
					check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
					check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_sons value = 1 }
					check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_daughters value = 1 }
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_age value = 1080 }}
					check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }
					check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_daughters value = 1 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_age value = 1080 }}
					check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_sons value = 1 }
					check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_daughters value = 1 }
				}
				check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m1_age value = 1080 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m1_sons value = 1 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m1_daughters value = 1 }}
				check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_age value = 1080 }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_sons value = 1 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_daughters value = 1 }}
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_age which = female_gen1_1 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_age which = female_gen1_2 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_2f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_2f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_age which = female_gen1_3 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_3f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_3f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_3f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_3f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_3f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_3f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_3f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_3f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_age which = female_gen1_4 age }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_4f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_sons value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f1_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_daughters value = 1 }

			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f2_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f3_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f4_age value = 1080 }}}
				change_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_daughters value = 1 }
			}
		}
		#NEW HEIRS
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age which = male_gen1_4m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons which = male_gen1_4m1_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters which = male_gen1_4m1_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age which = male_gen1_4m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_sons which = male_gen1_4m2_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_daughters which = male_gen1_4m2_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age which = male_gen1_4m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_sons which = male_gen1_4m3_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_daughters which = male_gen1_4m3_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age which = male_gen1_4m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_sons which = male_gen1_4m4_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_daughters which = male_gen1_4m4_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age which = female_gen1_4m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_sons which = female_gen1_4m1_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_daughters which = female_gen1_4m1_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age which = female_gen1_4m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_sons which = female_gen1_4m2_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_daughters which = female_gen1_4m2_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age which = female_gen1_4m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_sons which = female_gen1_4m3_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_daughters which = female_gen1_4m3_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age which = female_gen1_4m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_sons which = female_gen1_4m4_sons }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_daughters which = female_gen1_4m4_daughters }
		generate_new_grandchildren = yes
		clr_country_flag = lateral_shift_4
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = vef_salic_law }
		salic_law_heir_death = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = vef_malepref_primo }
		male_primogeniture_heir_death = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = vef_absolute_primo }
		absolute_primogeniture_heir_death = yes
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = vef_agnatic_senior }
		agnatic_seniority_heir_death = yes
	}
}

advance_generation = {
	#CHILDREN OF DYING MONARCH TO SIBLING LEVEL
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_2_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_3_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_4_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_1_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_2_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_3_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_4_heir
			}
		}
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age which = male_gen1_1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_display_age which = male_gen1_1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen1_2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_display_age which = male_gen1_2_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_age which = male_gen1_3_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_display_age which = male_gen1_3_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_age which = male_gen1_4_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_display_age which = male_gen1_4_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_age which = female_gen1_1_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_display_age which = female_gen1_1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_age which = female_gen1_2_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_display_age which = female_gen1_2_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_age which = female_gen1_3_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_display_age which = female_gen1_3_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_age which = female_gen1_4_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_display_age which = female_gen1_4_display_age }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_1m1_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_1m2_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_1m3_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_1m4_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_1m1_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_1m2_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_1m3_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_1m4_heir
			}
		}
		define_ruler_children = yes
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age which = male_gen1_1m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_display_age which = male_gen1_1m1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen1_1m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_display_age which = male_gen1_1m2_display_age }

		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_age which = female_gen1_1m2_age }

		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_age which = female_gen1_1m3_age }

		}
		define_ruler_children = yes
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age which = male_gen1_2m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_display_age which = male_gen1_2m1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen1_2m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_display_age which = male_gen1_2m2_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_age which = male_gen1_2m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_display_age which = male_gen1_2m3_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_age which = male_gen1_2m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_display_age which = male_gen1_2m4_display_age }

		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_age which = female_gen1_2m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_display_age which = female_gen1_2m2_display_age }

		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen1_3m2_age }

		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_display_age which = male_gen1_3m4_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_age which = female_gen1_3m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_display_age which = female_gen1_3m1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_age which = female_gen1_3m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_display_age which = female_gen1_3m2_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_age which = female_gen1_3m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_display_age which = female_gen1_3m3_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_age which = female_gen1_3m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_display_age which = female_gen1_3m4_display_age }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m1_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m2_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m3_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen1_4m4_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_4m1_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_4m2_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_4m3_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen1_4m4_heir
			}
		}
		define_ruler_children = yes
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age which = male_gen1_4m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_display_age which = male_gen1_4m1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen1_4m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_display_age which = male_gen1_4m2_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_age which = male_gen1_4m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_display_age which = male_gen1_4m3_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_age which = male_gen1_4m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_display_age which = male_gen1_4m4_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_age which = female_gen1_4m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_display_age which = female_gen1_4m1_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_age which = female_gen1_4m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_display_age which = female_gen1_4m2_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_age which = female_gen1_4m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_display_age which = female_gen1_4m3_display_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_age which = female_gen1_4m4_age }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_display_age which = female_gen1_4m4_display_age }
		define_ruler_children = yes
	}
	#GRANDCHILDREN TO NEPHEW/NIECE LEVEL
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_age which = male_gen2_1m1_age }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_sons which = male_gen2_1m1_sons }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_daughters which = male_gen2_1m1_daughters }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m2_age which = male_gen2_1m2_age }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m2_sons which = male_gen2_1m2_sons }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m2_daughters which = male_gen2_1m2_daughters }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m3_age which = male_gen2_1m3_age }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m3_sons which = male_gen2_1m3_sons }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m3_daughters which = male_gen2_1m3_daughters }

vef_kill_heir = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_1_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_1_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_2_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_2_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_3_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_3_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_4_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_4_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_1_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_1_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_1_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_2_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_2_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_2_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_3_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_3_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_3_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_4_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen0_4_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_4_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_2_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_2_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_3_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_3_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4_heir }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_4_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_1_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_1_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_2_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_2_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_3_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_3_heir
	}
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_4_heir }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_4_heir

		set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1f4_age value = 1100 }
		clr_country_flag = male_gen2_1f4_heir
	}

			check_variable = { which = ruler_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				change_variable = { which = ruler_sons value = -1 }
				set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 0 }}}

						NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 1080 }}
						check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 0 }}}
						set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 0 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
						check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 0 }}}
						set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 0 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
					set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 0 }}}
						set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -23 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -22 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -20 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -18 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -12 }}
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = ruler_sons value = 1 }}
		change_variable = { which = ruler_sons value = -1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }}
				check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age value = 1080 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 1080 }}
				check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 1080 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
			set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -23 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -22 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -20 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -18 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -12 }}
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = ruler_daughters value = 1 }}
		change_variable = { which = ruler_daughters value = -1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }}
				check_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age value = 1080 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 1080 }}
				check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
				check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1080 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1080 }}
			set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 0 }}}
				set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 0 }
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -23 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -22 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -20 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -18 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -12 }}
		}
	}
}

double_advance_generation = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m1_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m2_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m3_heir
				has_country_flag = male_gen2_1m4_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen2_1m1_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen2_1m2_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen2_1m3_heir
				has_country_flag = female_gen2_1m4_heir
			}
		}
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age which = male_gen2_1m1_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_sons which = male_gen2_1m1_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_daughters which = male_gen2_1m1_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen2_1m2_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_sons which = male_gen2_1m2_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_daughters which = male_gen2_1m2_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_age which = male_gen2_1m3_age }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_sons which = male_gen2_1m3_sons }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_daughters which = male_gen2_1m3_daughters }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_age which = male_gen2_1m4_age }

		set_variable = { which = male_gen0_4_daughters which = male_gen2_1m4_daughters }

triple_advance_generation = {
	#CLEAR CHILDREN
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_2_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_3_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen1_4_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = female_gen1_1_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = female_gen1_2_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = female_gen1_3_age value = 1100 }
	set_variable = { which = female_gen1_4_age value = 1100 }
	#DETERMINE SIBLINGS
	define_ruler_children = yes
	set_variable = { which = male_gen0_1_age which = male_gen1_1_age }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen0_2_age which = male_gen1_2_age }
	set_variable = { which = male_gen0_3_age which = male_gen1_3_age }

	set_variable = { which = female_gen2_4f4_daughters value = 0 }

generate_new_grandchildren = {
	#DEFINE NEW GRANDCHILDREN - MALE 1
	set_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc which = male_gen1_1_age }
	random_list = {
		20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -192 }}
		20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -204 }}
		20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -216 }}
		20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -228 }}
		20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -240 }}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons value = 1 }
			check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				change_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons value = -1 }
				set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }}}
					set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }
				}
			}
			50 = {
				change_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters value = -1 }
				set_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }}}
					set_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -23 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -22 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -20 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -18 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -12 }}
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons value = 1 }}
		change_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons value = -1 }
		set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }}}
			set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }
		}
		random_list = {
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -23 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -22 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -20 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -18 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -12 }}
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters value = 1 }}
		change_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters value = -1 }
		set_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }}}

		}

			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -18 }}
			20 = { change_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = -12 }}
		}
	}

		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons value = 1 }
			check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_daughters value = 1 }
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				change_variable = { which = male_gen1_1_sons value = -1 }

					limit = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
					set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }}}
						set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 0 }
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_age which = heir_temp_age_calc }
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_age value = 0 }}}
						set_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_age value = 0 }
					}
				}

}

store_current_heir = {
	if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_1_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen0_1_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen0_1_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_2_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen0_2_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen0_2_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_3_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen0_3_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen0_3_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen0_4_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen0_4_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen0_4_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen0_4_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_1_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen0_1_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen0_1_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_2_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen0_2_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen0_2_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_3_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen0_3_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen0_3_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen0_4_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen0_4_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen0_4_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen0_4_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen1_1_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_1_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_2_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen1_2_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_2_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_3_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen1_3_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_3_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = male_gen1_4_heir }
		exile_heir_as = male_gen1_4_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = male_gen1_4_stored
		clr_country_flag = male_gen1_4_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_1_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen1_1_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen1_1_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_1_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_2_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen1_2_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen1_2_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_2_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_3_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen1_3_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen1_3_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_3_heir
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { has_country_flag = female_gen1_4_heir }
		exile_heir_as = female_gen1_4_@ROOT
		set_country_flag = female_gen1_4_stored
		clr_country_flag = female_gen1_4_heir
	}
}

define_male_heir = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 24 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT  male = yes age = 1 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 36 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT male = yes age = 2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 48 }}}

}

define_female_heir = {
	if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 24 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 1 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 36 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 2 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 48 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 3 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 60 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 4 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 72 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 5 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 84 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 6 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 96 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 7 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 108 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 8 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 120 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 9 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 132 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 10 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 144 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 11 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 156 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 12 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 168 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 13 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 180 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 14 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 192 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 15 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 204 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 16 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = heir_temp_age_calc value = 216 }}}
		define_heir = { dynasty = ROOT female = yes age = 17 }
	}
	else_if = {

ruler_prowess_award = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = 10 }
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_10_award }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_10_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.300 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = 20 }
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_20_award }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_20_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.301 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = 30 }
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_30_award }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_30_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.302 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = 40 }
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_40_award }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_40_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.303 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = 50 }
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_50_award }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_50_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.304 }
	}
}

heir_prowess_award = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = heir_military_prowess value = 10 }
			NOT = { has_heir_flag = battle_10_award }
		}
		set_heir_flag = battle_10_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.305 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = heir_military_prowess value = 20 }
			NOT = { has_heir_flag = battle_20_award }
		}
		set_heir_flag = battle_20_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.306 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = heir_military_prowess value = 30 }
			NOT = { has_heir_flag = battle_30_award }
		}
		set_heir_flag = battle_30_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.307 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = heir_military_prowess value = 40 }
			NOT = { has_heir_flag = battle_40_award }
		}
		set_heir_flag = battle_40_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.308 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			check_variable = { which = heir_military_prowess value = 50 }
			NOT = { has_heir_flag = battle_50_award }
		}
		set_heir_flag = battle_50_award
		country_event = { id = vef_dynastic.309 }
	}
}

ruler_prowess_demerit = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = -10 }}
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_10_demerit }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_10_demerit
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.310 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = -20 }}
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_20_demerit }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_20_demerit
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.311 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = -30 }}
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_30_demerit }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_30_demerit
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.312 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = -40 }}
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_40_demerit }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_40_demerit
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.313 }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = ruler_military_prowess value = -50 }}
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = battle_50_demerit }
		}
		set_ruler_flag = battle_50_demerit
		country_event = { id = vef_dynasty.314 }
	}
}

determine_consort = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = male_gen0_1_heir
			OR = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_1m4_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_1m4_age value = 1080 }}
			}
		}
		define_consort = {}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = male_gen0_2_heir
			OR = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_2m4_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_2m4_age value = 1080 }}
			}
		}
		define_consort = {}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = male_gen0_3_heir
			OR = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_3m4_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_3m4_age value = 1080 }}
			}
		}
		define_consort = {}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = male_gen0_4_heir
			OR = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen1_4m4_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_4m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_4m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_4m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen1_4m4_age value = 1080 }}
			}
		}
		define_consort = {}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = male_gen1_1_heir
			OR = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = male_gen2_1m4_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m1_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m2_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m3_age value = 1080 }}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = female_gen2_1m4_age value = 1080 }}
			}
		}
		define_consort = {}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_country_flag = male_gen1_2_heir
